name: Performance Marketing
description: Here, the clients pay only when a solicited response is received from the target. It could be a lead received, a click or an actual sale.

name: Pay Per Click
description: As the name suggests, you pay only after someone clicks on the targeted link. This model is also called cost per click.

name: Google ads
description: If you want to receive a faster response on a larger scale, google ads help achieve it for you. Advertisers usually pay per click in this model of advertising.

name: Social Media Campaign Management
description: The effective social media campaign management maximizes benefits at minimal cost by targeting the right audience to achieve desired responses. This critical activity ensures messages reach the intended segments efficiently.
